§ 2170. Applicable rules of procedure The Federal Rules of Bankruptcy Procedure shall apply to a case under this subchapter and to all civil proceedings arising in or related to cases under this subchapter. (Pub. L. 114–187, title III, § 310, June 30, 2016, 130 Stat. 583.)
Editorial Notes
References in TextThe Federal Rules of Bankruptcy Procedure, referred to in text, are set out in the Appendix to Title 11, Bankruptcy.
